mapper.sql: SELECT bno, field, specialization, title, content, writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, reg_date, up_date FROM board
mapper.select: ORDER BY reg_date DESC, bno DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (field, specialization, title, content, writer) VALUES (#{field}, #{specialization}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET field = #{field}, specialization = #{specialization}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, up_date = now() WHERE bno = #{bno} and writer = #{writer}
mapper.select: ORDER BY reg_date DESC, bno DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

choose.when: AND (title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))

mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE true
